title: Can't purchase RP?
body:
Hey there, 
So I've been trying for the last few days to purchase RP with 2 separate cards - 1 Mastercard and 1 Visa - And keep receiving the same error about too many attempts in the past 24 hours. 

Any idea if it's just my client that isn't working properly or if there's a bug with the shop? 

Thank you.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you transferred recently? Changed your name?

I would [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to have Player Support look into your account if you're absolutely sure that 24 hours has passed since your last transaction.
